mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CouponDistribution ( coupon_id, user_id, gender_filter, region_filter, create_time ) VALUES
(#{item.couponId}, #{item.userId}, #{item.genderFilter}, #{item.regionFilter}, #{item.createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT d.distribution_id, d.coupon_id, d.user_id, d.gender_filter, d.region_filter, d.create_time, u.username, u.email, u.phone, u.gender, c.type, c.discount_value, c.min_order_amount, c.status FROM CouponDistribution d LEFT JOIN `User` u ON d.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN Coupon c ON d.coupon_id = c.coupon_id WHERE d.distribution_id = #{id}
